Text: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
Stars_Heroes: John Travolta,Uma Thurman,Samuel L. Jackson,Bruce Willis

Text: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
Stars_Heroes: Lilly Wachowski,Keanu Reeves,Laurence Fishburne,Carrie-Anne Moss,Hugo Weaving

Movie_Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Text: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Movie_Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
Text: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Movie_Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
Text: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.
Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
Stars_Heroes: Morgan Freeman,Brad Pitt,Kevin Spacey,Andrew Kevin Walker

Text: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.
Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
Stars_Heroes: Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Scarlett Johansson,Jeremy Renner

Text: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
Stars_Heroes: Jodie Foster,Anthony Hopkins,Lawrence A. Bonney,Kasi Lemmons

Text: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist
Stars_Heroes: Steven Spielberg,Liam Neeson,Ralph Fiennes,Ben Kingsley,Caroline Goodall

Text: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Movie_Name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
Text: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.
Stars_Heroes: Mark Hamill,Harrison Ford,Carrie Fisher,Billy Dee Williams

Text: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
Stars_Heroes: Tom Hanks,Michael Clarke Duncan,David Morse,Bonnie Hunt

Text: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
Stars_Heroes: Guy Pearce,Carrie-Anne Moss,Joe Pantoliano,Mark Boone Junior

Text: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
Stars_Heroes: Al Pacino,Robert De Niro,Robert Duvall,Diane Keaton

Text: In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.
A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.
Stars_Heroes: Michael J. Fox,Christopher Lloyd,Lea Thompson,Crispin Glover

Text: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

Movie_Name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
Text: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate "Captain" Jack Sparrow to save his love, the governor's daughter, from Jack's former pirate allies, who are now undead.

Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by LÃ©on, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protÃ©gÃ©e and learns the assassin's trade.
The story of
Stars_Heroes: Martin Scorsese,Robert De Niro,Ray Liotta,Joe Pesci,Lorraine Bracco

Text: After awakening from a four-year coma, a former assassin wreaks vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her.
A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.
In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

Movie_Name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
Text: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.
Stars_Heroes: Mark Hamill,Harrison Ford,Carrie Fisher,Billy Dee Williams

Text: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
Stars_Heroes: Lee Unkrich,Albert Brooks,Ellen DeGeneres,Alexander Gould,Willem Dafoe

Text: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
Stars_Heroes: Robert Downey Jr.,Gwyneth Paltrow,Terrence Howard,Jeff Bridges

Text: A lion cub prince is tricked by a treacherous uncle into thinking he caused his father's death and flees into exile in despair, only to later accept in adulthood his identity and his responsibilities.
Stars_Heroes: Rob Minkoff,Matthew Broderick,Jeremy Irons,James Earl Jones,Whoopi Goldberg

Text: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.
Stars_Heroes: Bob Peterson,Edward Asner,Jordan Nagai,John Ratzenberger,Christopher Plummer

Text: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.
When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
